description: 415 degree panoramic color photograph; train at center in background with tilled garden plot and planted plots below; road at center, moving off to left and right; swampy land with standing water visible at left and right; construction equipment behind tall grass at right; framed
marks: \"Foster\", in graphite, LRC on mount, below image
title: Hamamatsu: Shinkansen near Hamanatsu from "The Tokaido Road" series
